info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 13 at 4:02PM PDT until August 13 at 6:45PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR SOUTHERN SAN BERNARDINO COUNTY... At 402 PM PDT, local law enforcement reported thunderstorms producing heavy rain in Joshua Tree. California Highway Patrol reported flooding across all four lanes of State Route 62 by Hillview Road in Joshua Tree, CA. Up to 1 inch of rain has fallen. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Twentynine Palms, Yucca Valley, Twentynine Palms Base, Joshua Tree Lake Campground, Joshua Tree and Twentynine Palms Airport. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
